languages.text: "Возможно, мутация растений связана со сливом отходов от механизмов, снимающих урожай. А изменение повадок животных — реакция на расширение агрономического ареала". {n}Вистенца со смехом качает головой.{/n} "Удивлены моим знанием вопроса? Наша династия посвятила себя укрощению Януса — плодородной, но столь упорной планеты. Каждый член родословной Вьятт знает основы планетарного изменения — и его последствия".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, мутация растений связана со сливом отходов от механизмов, снимающих урожай. А изменение повадок животных — реакция на расширение агрономического ареала". {n}Вистенца со смехом качает головой.{/n} "Удивлены моим знанием вопроса? Наша династия посвятила себя укрощению Януса — плодородной, но столь упорной планеты. Каждый член родословной Вьятт знает основы планетарного изменения — и его последствия".

languages.text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behaviour could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? Our whole dynasty has dedicated itself to taming Janus, this plentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline is versed in the fundamentals of planetary engineering — and its consequences."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, мутация растений связана со сливом отходов от механизмов, снимающих урожай. А изменение повадок животных — реакция на расширение агрономического ареала". {n}Вистенца со смехом качает головой.{/n} "Удивлены моим знанием вопроса? Наша династия посвятила себя укрощению Януса — плодородной, но столь упорной планеты. Каждый член родословной Вьятт знает основы планетарного изменения — и его последствия".

traits.locale_text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behavior could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? I love Janus, my homeworld, and I am personally invested in seeing this world flourish and become more beautiful with each decade. To truly control a planet, one must know the forces that govern it. If only to subdue them to one's will."

Our whole dynasty dedicated itself to taming Janus, pIentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline knows the ropes of planetary engineering — and the consequences of it."

languages.text: “植物的变异可能与收割设备的废渣倾倒有关，而野生动物的行为变化，可能是由于耕地面积扩大导致的结果。”{n}维丝坦萨笑着摇了摇头。{/n}“我对这个话题这么了解，您对此感到惊讶吗？我们整个王朝都致力于驯服加努斯这颗丰饶而顽固的行星。维亚特家族的每位成员，都精通行星工程的基本原理，以及行星改造的后果。”
languages.original_text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behaviour could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? Our whole dynasty has dedicated itself to taming Janus, this plentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline is versed in the fundamentals of planetary engineering — and its consequences."

traits.locale_text: “植物的变异可能与收割设备的废渣倾倒有关，而野生动物的行为变化，可能是由于耕地面积扩大导致的结果。”{n}维丝坦萨笑着摇了摇头。{/n}“我对这个话题这么了解，您对此感到惊讶吗？我们整个王朝都致力于驯服加努斯这颗丰饶而顽固的行星。维亚特家族的每位成员，都精通行星工程的基本原理，以及行星改造的后果。”

languages.text: «Es posible que las mutaciones en la vegetación estén relacionadas con los residuos generados por el equipo agrícola. Al mismo tiempo, las alteraciones en el comportamiento de la fauna podrían atribuirse a la ampliación de los campos de cultivo». {n}Vistenza se ríe y menea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Le sorprenden mis conocimientos sobre el tema? Toda nuestra dinastía se dedica a domar Janus, este planeta tan rico como testarudo. El linaje entero de los Vyatt es conocedor de los conceptos fundamentales de la ingeniería planetaria... y de sus consecuencias».
languages.original_text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behaviour could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? Our whole dynasty has dedicated itself to taming Janus, this plentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline is versed in the fundamentals of planetary engineering — and its consequences."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible que las mutaciones en la vegetación estén relacionadas con los residuos generados por el equipo agrícola. Al mismo tiempo, las alteraciones en el comportamiento de la fauna podrían atribuirse a la ampliación de los campos de cultivo». {n}Vistenza se ríe y menea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Le sorprenden mis conocimientos sobre el tema? Toda nuestra dinastía se dedica a domar Janus, este planeta tan rico como testarudo. El linaje entero de los Vyatt es conocedor de los conceptos fundamentales de la ingeniería planetaria... y de sus consecuencias».

languages.text: 「植物の突然変異は収穫装置から漏れた廃棄物と関連があるかもしれません。また、野生動物の行動変化は耕作地の拡大に連動しているようです」{n}ヴィステンツァは笑って首を振る。{/n}「私の知識量に驚かれましたか？ビャット一族はヤヌスを飼い慣らすことに専念してまいりました、この資源豊富にして気難しい星を。ビャットの血筋に連なる全員が惑星工学の基礎を熟知しています—もちろんその結果についても」
languages.original_text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behaviour could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? Our whole dynasty has dedicated itself to taming Janus, this plentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline is versed in the fundamentals of planetary engineering — and its consequences."

traits.locale_text: 「植物の突然変異は収穫装置から漏れた廃棄物と関連があるかもしれません。また、野生動物の行動変化は耕作地の拡大に連動しているようです」{n}ヴィステンツァは笑って首を振る。{/n}「私の知識量に驚かれましたか？ビャット一族はヤヌスを飼い慣らすことに専念してまいりました、この資源豊富にして気難しい星を。ビャットの血筋に連なる全員が惑星工学の基礎を熟知しています—もちろんその結果についても」

languages.text: "Möglicherweise haben die Mutationen bei den Pflanzen etwas mit der Abfallentsorgung der Erntemaschinen zu tun. Und die Verhaltensänderungen bei den Tieren könnten eine Reaktion auf die Vergrößerung der kultivierten Gebiete sein." {n}Vistenza schüttelt lachend den Kopf.{/n} "Überraschen Euch meine Kenntnisse bei diesem Thema? Unsere ganze Dynastie hat sich der Zähmung von Janus verschrieben, diesem reichhaltigen, aber sturen Planeten. Jedes Mitglied der Vyatt-Blutlinie ist mit den Grundlagen der Planetenentwicklung vertraut – und ihrer Konsequenzen."
languages.original_text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behaviour could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? Our whole dynasty has dedicated itself to taming Janus, this plentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline is versed in the fundamentals of planetary engineering — and its consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Möglicherweise haben die Mutationen bei den Pflanzen etwas mit der Abfallentsorgung der Erntemaschinen zu tun. Und die Verhaltensänderungen bei den Tieren könnten eine Reaktion auf die Vergrößerung der kultivierten Gebiete sein." {n}Vistenza schüttelt lachend den Kopf.{/n} "Überraschen Euch meine Kenntnisse bei diesem Thema? Unsere ganze Dynastie hat sich der Zähmung von Janus verschrieben, diesem reichhaltigen, aber sturen Planeten. Jedes Mitglied der Vyatt-Blutlinie ist mit den Grundlagen der Planetenentwicklung vertraut – und ihrer Konsequenzen."

languages.text: « Les mutations des plantes sont peut-être dues aux déchets produits par l'équipement de récolte. Quant aux animaux, il est possible que leur comportement ait changé en réaction à l'expansion des zones cultivées. » {n}Vistenza secoue la tête en riant.{/n} « Mes connaissances en la matière vous étonnent-elles ? Notre dynastie entière s'est employée à dompter Janus, cette planète aussi féconde que rétive. Tous les membres de la lignée des Vyatt connaissent les principes de base de l'ingénierie planétaire, ainsi que ses conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behaviour could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? Our whole dynasty has dedicated itself to taming Janus, this plentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline is versed in the fundamentals of planetary engineering — and its consequences."

Tous les membres de la lignée des Vyatt connaissent les principes de base de l'ingénierie planétaire, ainsi que ses conséquences. »

languages.text: "Bitki mutasyonlarına hasat ekipmanından kaynaklanan atıkların sebep olması mümkün. Yaban hayatındaki davranış değişiklikleri ise ekili toprakların genişlemesine bir tepki olabilir." {n}Vistenza gülerek başını sallıyor.{/n} "Konuyla ilgili bilgili olmama mı şaşırdınız? Tüm hanedanlığımız, kendisini bu bereketli ama bir o kadar da inatçı gezegeni ehlîleştirmeye adadı. Vyatt soyunun her mensubu, gezegen mühendisliğinin temelleri ve elbette sonuçları konusunda uzmandır."
languages.original_text: "It's possible that the plant mutations are connected to waste run-off from the harvesting equipment. And the changes in wildlife behaviour could be a reaction to the expansion of the cultivated area." {n}Vistenza shakes her head with a laugh.{/n} "Are you surprised by my knowledge of the topic? Our whole dynasty has dedicated itself to taming Janus, this plentiful yet stubborn planet. Every member of the Vyatt bloodline is versed in the fundamentals of planetary engineering — and its consequences."
